statements: SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM Feedback WHERE id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 2 AND rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 7 AND rating < 3 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%amazing%'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) >= 3;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, status FROM customer_feedback cf JOIN support_tickets st ON cf.customer_id = st.customer_id ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_title, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 'f07b225f-6ba3-4ff2-962c-99978f44b5ab';
SELECT id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_title, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT username, email, role FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'open';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM customers JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM ticket_history ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT support_agents.agent_name, support_tickets.issue_description FROM support_agents JOIN support_tickets ON support_agents.agent_id = support_tickets.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, COUNT(support_tickets.ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name ORDER BY ticket_count DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, ticket_status, ticket_open_date FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
